abstract: The Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic slowed down global economic activity at an unprecedented scale and migrant workers and their families are among the hardest hit.
alt: A figure titled Figure 3. Overseas Filipinos' Personal Remittances and Their Share to GNI and GDP. The figure shows remittances increasing between 2009 and 2020, with share to GDP and share to GNI falling slightly or remaining constant.
shorttitle: Effect of COVID-19 Pandemic on OFW Deployment and Remittances At A Glance
